LEGAL NOTIFICATION
Pursuant To The
DIGITAL MILLENIUM COPYRIGHT ACT / EUROPEAN UNION COPYRIGHT DIRECTIVE /  
EUROPEAN CONVENTION ON HUMAN RIGHTS

NOTE : AN ORIGINAL HARD-COPY SIGNATURE FOR WEB SHERIFF IS LODGED ON FILE  
WITH GOOGLE.

1. Rights Owner(s) :  VIRTUAL PROPERTY WORLD LTD / MICHAEL PATTEMORE /  
LYNDA BELLINGHAM / MICHAEL PELUSO

2. Rights Agent :   WEB SHERIFF

3. Infringed Rights :  COPYRIGHT / TRADEMARK / GOODWILL & REPUTATION /  
RIGHTS PURSUANT TO GOOGLE'S ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY / HUMAN RIGHTS  
(CONVENTION ARTICLES 8 & 14)

4. Infringed Entities :  VIRTUAL PROPERTY WORLD LTD / MICHAEL PATTEMORE /  
LYNDA BELLINGHAM / MICHAEL PELUSO

5. Infringed Subject Matter : COPYRIGHT PHOTOGRAPHS & COPYRIGHT ARTWORK /  
TRADEMARK NAME & LOGO / GOODWILL & REPUTATION / GOOGLE'S ACCEPTABLE USE  
POLICY / HUMAN RIGHTS (CONVENTION ARTICLES 8 & 14)

6. Infringing Activity : INFRINGEMENT OF COPYRIGHT (VIA, INTER ALIA,  
UNAUTHORIZED REPRODUCTION & PUBLICATION OF COPYRIGHT PHOTOGRAPHS &  
COPYRIGHT ARTWORK) / INFRINGEMENT OF TRADEMARK (VIA, INTER ALIA,  
UNAUTHORIZED REPRODUCTION & PUBLICATION OF TRADEMARK NAME & TRADEMARK LOGO)  
/ DEFAMATION (LIBEL) /  HARRASSMENT (BREACH OF GOOGLE'S ACCEPTABLE USE  
POLICY - BY REASON OF USING THE SERVICE TO VIOLATE, OR ENCOURAGE THE  
VIOLATION OF, THE LEGAL RIGHTS OF OTHERS AND / OR BY REASON OF USING THE  
SERVICE FOR ANY UNLAWFUL, INVASIVE, INFRINGING, DEFAMATORY OR FRAUDULENT  
PURPOSE) / BREACH OF HUMAN RIGHTS (ARTICLE 8 - RIGHT TO PRIVACY & ARTICLE  
14 - FREEDOM FROM DISCRIMINATION)

7. Infringing Web Site : BLOGSPOT.CO.UK

8. Infringing File Location(s) :
